name: Sky Defender
description:
Hand-drawn retro "Space Invaders" inspired minigame. This was created based on Ben Tristem's original Unity course on Udemy.  Two modes of play are offered, "1980's" mode, a casual, almost laid-back playstyle would fit this mode best. Then there's "insane" mode, because: reasons. 

Don't be fooled by the slow start to insane mode. Clear the first dozen waves of enemies and take note: your battle has only just begun. Soon, you'll be crying to go back to the good ol' days when the screen wasn't filled with a near continuous rain of enemy fire.
